name: Graphic Design
description: Our graphic design courses help students develop creative and technical skills for a successful career in design. Covering topics like visual communication, typography, digital illustration, and UI/UX design, this course blends artistic principles with modern design technology.
assessments: Digital design portfolio including logo and branding projects
Online quizzes on design principles and software tools
User interface and user experience (UI/UX) project presentations
overview:
Unleash Your Creativity in the World of Design

This course provides students with industry-relevant skills in graphic design, covering everything from branding and typography to UI/UX design. Learn how to create compelling visuals and work with industry-standard software to bring your creative ideas to life.
skills: Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign proficiency
User interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design principles
purposes: Upon successful completion, students will receive a Certificate II in Graphic Design.
Graduates will have a strong portfolio to showcase their skills to potential employers or clients.
Students can pursue further education in visual communication, multimedia design, or animation.
